effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot!, growing a Wild Mushroom at a nearby enemy's location at 100% effectiveness. Casting Celestial Alignment or Incarnation: Chosen of Elune always hits a Jackpot!.
Set: Starfall and Starsurge damage against targets affected by your Wild Mushroom's damage over time effect is increased by 20%.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Look through the lens and randomly scale up or down, gaining 10,016 Critical Strike or Haste for 15 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

name: Algari Alchemist Stone

spells.description: Equip: When you heal or deal damage you have a chance to increase your Strength, Agility, or Intellect by 20,182 for 15 sec. Your highest stat is always chosen.
Equip: Increases the effect that healing and mana potions have on the wearer by 40%.  This effect does not stack.

description: Can be used for transmutations in place of a Philosopher's Stone.

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

Transmogrified to:
Bouquet of Scarlet Begonias

spells.description: Equip: You champion the cause of Darnassus.  All reputation gains while in dungeons will be applied to your standing with them.
